effect.x_y: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Averages the user’s unmodified Defense with the target’s unmodified Defense; the value becomes the unmodified Defense for both Pokémon. Unmodified Special Defense is averaged the same way.

short_effect.x_y: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.
